archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Correlate Resource Performance Event Notifications
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: This process passes information about potential specific service performance degradations arising from specific resource degradations to Service Quality Management to manage any necessary restoration activity as determined by that process. It passes information about resource failures due to performance threshold violations to Resource Trouble Management to manage any necessary restoration activity as determined by that process. It forwards resource performance degradation notifications to other Resource Performance Management processes, which manage activities to restore normal specific resource performance

properties.value: Not used for this process element
